# Node modules
node_modules/

# Environment variables
.env

# Logs
logs
*.log
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Optional npm cache directory
.npm

# IDE specific files
.idea/
.vscode/
*.suo
*.ntvs*
*.njsproj
*.sln

# Dependency directories
client/node_modules/
server/node_modules/

# Coverage directory used by tools like istanbul
coverage/

# Optional eslint cache
.eslintcache

# Optional stylelint cache
.stylelintcache

# nyc test coverage
.nyc_output/

# Optional REPL history
.node_repl_history
